content: rib for 0 75 0 75 0 75 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 25 1 25 1 25 1 25 1 25 1 25 1 5 1 5 1 5 1 5 switch to larger sleeve sts on hold needles and proceed to neckline increase round ribbing last method an alternative method is to pick up and knit a body ribbed neckline after completing the remainder of the sweater this creates more structure from which the sweater can hang this is most useful for larger sizes and heavier yarn weights working the ribbing last also makes it easier to adjust the neckline stitch count gauge and bind-off gauge for a perfect fit after casting on switch to larger needles knit a single round then proceed to neckline increase round neckline increase round knit increasing 16 16 14 20 24 30 16 24 28 32 24 32 36 30 38 52 60 72 84 sts evenly spaced 84 88 92 104 112 120 112 124 128 136 136 144 148 148 156 176 184 196 212 sts flax sweater dk facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com 4 of knitting direction markers back sleeve sleeve ribbed collar collar front back front eveels thgir tfel eveels yoke garter panel increase lines at raglan markers separation of sleeves and sleeve sts body on hold sts cast on body sts at underarms on needle sleeves garter panel d o ir f e k c n ti i o tt n in g yoke round 5 knit to raglan marker sm kfb knit to 2 sts before raglan marker kfb k1 sm twice 4 sts marker set-up k2 p10 10 10 12 12 12 12 14 increase - 2 sts at each front and back 14 14 14 16 16 18 18 20 20 20 20 k2 pm round 6 knit to garter panel purl garter panel k28 30 32 36 40 44 40 44 46 50 50 52 54 52 knit to raglan marker sm kfb knit to 2 sts before 56 64 68 74 82 pm twice raglan marker kfb k1 sm twice 4 sts increase - 2 sts the 4 raglan markers separate the right sleeve at each front and back front left sleeve and back sections work rounds 5-6 a total of 2 2 2 3 3 3 times the central 10 10 10 12 12 12 12 14 14 14 this is 4 4 4 6 6 6 rounds 14 16 16 18 18 20 20 20 20 sts purled in the 380 412 448 488 516 548 total sts sleeve sections are the garter panels - they are worked in garter st from this point to the cuff 76 82 88 94 98 102 sts at each sleeve to work garter st in the round knit 1 round then 114 124 136 150 160 172 sts at each front and purl the next back note you may place markers of a different colour check yoke depth
